amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the functional equivalence provisions of the bill and to clarify that all mine explorations or permits would be considered major Federal actions requiring an environmental impact statement under NEPA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-301 to ensure that mining permits are fully reviewed under the National Environmental Policy Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 248 (Roll no. 561).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 248 (Roll no. 561).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Dingell.
